FuncDef: The display multicast user-ip command displays information about multicast programs that a specified user joins on a BAS interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about multicast programs that a specified user joins on a BAS interface.
The address ranges from FF00:: to FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF, in the hexadecimal format.

ExtraInfo: To check information about multicast programs that a specified user joins on a BAS interface, run the display multicast user-ip command.
